name: DevOps Dont's - 2.txt - Background
description: This section explains an issue that occurred when modifying the path patterns associated with a Lambda function in a CloudFront distribution. Due to a drift between Terraform and external changes made by a GitHub Action, the order of the path patterns was changed, and Terraform ended up removing the Lambda function association unexpectedly. The root cause was identified as an issue with the AWS SDK used by Terraform.
use_cases: Managing path patterns and behaviors in CloudFront distributions
Handling drift between Terraform and external changes
Troubleshooting issues related to Terraform and AWS SDK
